DTMod:PactStone.NAME: Pact Stone
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, [#60D0D0]You[] and [#60D0D0]Dragon[] gain #b
#yTemporary_HP each.

DTMod:DragonTamerSkillbook.NAME: Dragon Tamer's Skillbook
DTMod:DragonTamerSkillbook.FLAVOR: Now the dragon is capable of helping people other than the master.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a card that affects both you and another character, gain #b1 #yragontaer:Bonding.
NL NL #yMulticlass Dragon Tamer

DTMod:BasicTextbook.NAME: Basic Textbook
DTMod:BasicTextbook.FLAVOR: Basic skills are the most important things to learn.
DESCRIPTIONS: Increase the damage of Strike and #yBlock from Target Defense by #b
[REMOVE_SPACE].

DTMod:OddArmor.NAME: Odd Armor
DTMod:OddArmor.FLAVOR: Because it looks odd, people don't want to wear it even though it's powerful.
DESCRIPTIONS: On odd-numbered turns, [#60D0D0]Dragon[] takes #b
less damage from attacks. NL On even-numbered turns, [#60D0D0]You[] take #b
less damage from attacks.

DTMod:MagicStone.NAME: Magic Stone
DTMod:MagicStone.FLAVOR: The Pact Stone absorbed weird magic.
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces #yPact #yStone. At the start of each combat, [#60D0D0]You[] and [#60D0D0]Dragon[] heal #b
HP. NL During combat, excess amount of healing is converted to #yTemporary_HP.

DTMod:DragonFood.NAME: Dragon Food
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of combat, [#60D0D0]Dragon[] heals #b
HP.

DTMod:AncientBone.NAME: Ancient Bone
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, add a #yHard #ySkin into your hand.

DTMod:TacticalNote.NAME: Tactical Note
DESCRIPTIONS: All cards containing "Tactic" have their effects boosted.
Bonus Effects
#bSwitching #bTactic - Enemies lose 2 more Strength.
#bBizarre #bTactic - Gain 2 more Block, deal 2 more damage.
#bRunning #bTactic - Draw 1 additional card.
#bEcho #bTactic - Now costs 0.
#bOpening #bTactic - Gain 1 additional Dexterity if the enemy has full HP.

DTMod:SwitchButton.NAME: Switch Button
DESCRIPTIONS: [#2aecd7]Once [#2aecd7]per [#2aecd7]combat, [#2aecd7]right [#2aecd7]click [#2aecd7]to [#2aecd7]activate.[] [#60D0D0]You[] and [#60D0D0]Dragon[] swaps #yragontaer:Aggro.

DTMod:SolidMemories.NAME: Solid Memories
DTMod:SolidMemories.FLAVOR: The origin form of Liquid Memories.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of turn #b
[REMOVE_SPACE], #yFetch a card from your discard pile. It costs #b0 for the turn.

DTMod:BindingString.NAME: Binding String
DTMod:BindingString.FLAVOR: The combination of two fighters is better when they are close.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, if [#60D0D0]You[] and [#60D0D0]Dragon[] have the same #yragontaer:Aggro, gain #b
#yragontaer:Bonding.

DTMod:TheChair.NAME: The Chair
DTMod:TheChair.FLAVOR: This comfortable chair makes you energized, but switching from rest mode becomes harder. Unless you're talented.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. On turn #b1, you only draw #yInnate cards and cards in Bottle relics.

DTMod:MindBender.NAME: Mind Bender
DESCRIPTIONS: When you play a card that let you choose the attacker, you may pick any enemy as the attacker.
'Choose the Attacker' cards
- Reckless Flurry NL - Taunting Strike NL - Tri Attack
